VIII.iv.2.D.4.d
.
Final Responsibility for Determining SC for Post-Traumatic Osteoarthritis in an FPOW Claim
The rating activity has the final responsibility for determining whether a relationship exists between the development of arthritis and the Veteran’s experiences as a POW.
Note
:  Any reasonable doubt arising after review of the evidence
must
be resolved in favor of the Veteran.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D - Rating Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
